string.name: name
string.value: I'm Bored 1

string.name: parent
string.value: I'm Bored
I should go see Icarus, who's at the top of a building in Kerning City. He seems to be bored out of his mind.
I got to talk to Icarus of Kerning City. Just what exactly is he doing staring aimlessly at the sky anyway? He seemed to be really bored, and asked me if I can answer his set of questions.
I answered all the questions that Icarus of Kerning City asked. That was easy.
Man, soooo boring. Hey, you! Do you have any free time right now? Do you wanna hang out with me? I'm really bored out of my mind here.
Alright! Thanks... now, what should we do? How about ... I know, why don't I quiz you on some things? They aren't going to be hard at all, so don't worry about it. Are you down with it?
Oh you're busy ... I'm really bored, though. Don't you wanna hang out with me?

Which of these monsters will you NOT see near Kerning City? 
#L0##b1. Stump#k #l#L1##b2. Blue Mushroom#k #l
#L2##b3. Slime#k #l
#L3##b4. Ribbon Pig#k #l
#L4##b5. Hector#k #l

Which of these NPC's will not NOT see at Kerning City?
#L0##b1. Don Giovanni#k #l
#L1##b2. Andre#k #l
#L2##b3. Mong From the Kong#k #l
#L3##b4. Valen#k 
#L4##b5. Don Hwang#k #l

To make your way to Orbis, which of these towns will you have to go to get on board for the trip?
#L0##b1. Ellinia#k #l
#L1##b2. El Nath#k #l
#L3##b3. Perion#k #l
#L4##b4. Henesys#k #l
Wow, you're pretty good! You should be starring on a quiz show, the way you're answering these questions!
No no no! Think carefully!
No no no! Think carefully!
No no no! Think carefully!
No no no! Think carefully!
You're wrong!! You can see that NPC at Kerning City!
You're wrong!! You can see that NPC at Kerning City!
You're wrong!! You can see that NPC at Kerning City!
You're wrong!! You can see that NPC at Kerning City!
Are you sure? Think again!
Are you sure? Think again!
Are you sure? Think again!
Are you sure? Think again!
